name: WP Quick Contact Us
author: Binish Prabhakar

sections.description:
WP Quick Contact Plugin is a simple pop up contact form. User can use it to send message with their phone no:, Email-id, Subject. The admin side consist of ‘To’, ‘BCC’ and ‘Subject’ fields.

WP Quick Contact Plugin allows you to:
* Simply place in your posts, pages,.
Please visit http://www.dmitritech.com to download the plugin.
sections.installation:
See the Screenshots for detailed Installation.

  1. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-quick-contact-us/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Go to WP Quick Contact menu in WordPress.

See the Screenshots for for more details.
sections.faq:
For support and general inquiries please email to info@dmitritech.com
Please allow up to 48 hours for a reply. Thanks!

Please use these support channels appropriately.

For More Features, please visit

  • WP Quick Contact
sections.changelog: • Currently there is no data for the changelog

short_description: A plugin to creating floating contact form on home, pages or posts.
description:
WP Quick Contact Plugin is a simple pop up contact form. User can use it to send message with their phone no:, Email-id, Subject. The admin side consist of ‘To’, ‘BCC’ and ‘Subject’ fields.

WP Quick Contact Plugin allows you to:

Please visit http://www.dmitritech.com to download the plugin.

upgrade_notice: The current version of WP Quick Contact requires WordPress 3.2 or higher. If you use older version of WordPress, you need to upgrade WordPress first.
